code: import React,{useState}from"react";import"./NewTodo.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EditTodo=_ref=>{let{todo,onClose,onSave}=_ref;const[newInput,setNewInput]=useState(todo.text||"");const[newDesc,setNewDesc]=useState(todo.description||"");const[newStatus,setNewStatus]=useState(todo.status||"Pending");const handleSave=()=>{onSave(todo._id,{text:newInput,description:newDesc,status:newStatus});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"main2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Edit To-Do"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cont-inp",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:newInput,type:"text",onChange:e=>setNewInput(e.target.value),placeholder:"New Task"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:newDesc,onChange:e=>setNewDesc(e.target.value),placeholder:"New Description",rows:"1"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cont-adde",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:newStatus,onChange:e=>setNewStatus(e.target.value),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Pending",children:"Pending"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"In Progress",children:"In Progress"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Completed",children:"Completed"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"btn-edit",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSave,children:"Save"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onClose,children:"Cancel"})]})]})]})});};export default EditTodo;
